T11bsa064_u:1119: athottaravādinaṃ sādhanadoṣamudbhāvayantamaparo doṣābhāsavacanenābhiyuñjīta, tasya tena bhūtadoṣatve pratipādite sādhanābhāsavacanenaiva nigṛhīta iti /

T11bsa064_u:1126: tathā 'na sato vināśaḥ, nāsadutpadyate'; iti siddhāntamabhyupetya pakṣamavasthāpayati - 'ekāntā prakṛtiḥ vyaktasya avyaktalakṣaṇā; vikārāṇām anvayadarśanāt /

T11bsa064_u:1132: pravartate sā prakṛtiḥ, yat tad dharmāntaraṃ sa vikāra iti /
T11bsa064_u:1139: pravṛttirvā- ityevaṃ pratyavasthite yadi sa sata ātmahānamasataścātmalābhamabhyupaiti, apasiddhānto bhavati /

T11bsa064_u:1145: tatraikā prakṛtiḥ sukhaduḥkhamohāstadavibhaktayonikam idaṃ vyaktaṃ, tadanvayadarśanāt /
T11bsa064_u:1150: 91. atra taduktasya hetordoṣamanudbhāvya vikāraprakṛtilakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchan svayamayaṃ prakṛtāsambandhena aniyamāt kathāṃ pravartayati /
